name: Sensory Processing Disorder Mechanics - DnD 5e
description:
For individuals with Sensory Processing Disorder, things that may not bother most people can be a struggle, painful, or completely unbearable. These mechanics are built for DnD 5e for characters with SPD. Includes additional stats, meltdowns and shutdowns, overstimulation, and additional effects from conditions. Must be used alongside the STRESS POINT SYSTEM, available free on our page. 

Written by individuals with SPD. 

Screenreader accessible pdf.
